title: Why does my level not update?

replies.body:
This has to do with how Boards and League of Legends talks to each other.  Now that you have made a post/comment, you level should automatically update in the near future.

Just sit tight for now!

Appreciate the comment man...Imma just wait then.

Thanks for the answer and have a great day!
From hovering over, it looks like it is showing you as Level 8, which is your current level.  It looks like it properly synced! :D
